description:
First floor private apartment in Brooklyn very close to #4 and #3 subway - 2 minute walk.
Half block from the park 
Features 2 bedrooms kitchen and bathroom
name: Large private apartment 2 rooms
review: Itamar was a great host, very kind and attentive. He was supportive on our request for earlier check in and late check out. Place is just a few blocks from the subway and getting to manhattan doesn't takes more than 20 minutes.
